settings.heading: Extended Producer Responsibility
settings.headingsub: ForSURE streamlines your EPR reporting process today

settings.title: Thank You for Registering!
settings.text: Your EPR journey is about to begin. Please look out for our activation email, where you can set up your password. Remember to check your spam folder just in case. If you can't find the email, please don't hesitate to contact us for assistance. Let's get started!
